nope, setup-kube-dns-manifest is still wrong in master:

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/c3c050c88f4265ba77464682801e2cc1ab8021f7/cluster/gce/gci/configure-helper.sh#L2492-L2495

@liggitt the configure-helper.sh only looks at kube-dns.yaml.in which has no "pillar" references anymore.
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/c3c050c88f4265ba77464682801e2cc1ab8021f7/cluster/addons/dns/kube-dns/kube-dns.yaml.in#L33

so the reference string replace above should be enough.
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/cluster/addons/dns/kube-dns/transforms2salt.sed still has some "pillar" references, but I don't think that is used anywhere.

 The issue @aojea is referring to was specific to nodelocaldns, which got fixed.
